title: Coffee & herbal tea bar, Quartz countertops
posting_body: Follow the link to view a video of our beautiful model apartment:
919 S. Winchester Blvd, San Jose, CA, 95128
This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1064 Sq.
Welcome to Lynhaven: a tranquil sanctuary, in the heart of San Jose.
One part Left-Coast style, one part contemporary comfort, Lynhaven’s two buildings — The Winslow and The Josie — combine to create a one-of-a-kind experience.
Living spaces feature modern architecture, top-flight amenities, and high-end finishes.
Call us today for more information!
- Smart features with NEST Thermostats & keyless entry
- Double vanities and tile flooring in bath areas
- GE washer & dryer in each home
- Carpet and blackout roller shades in bedrooms
- GE gas range in all homes
- Bike repair shop & bike storage room
- Two rooftop decks with social spaces, TVs, & outdoor kitchens
- Outdoor fireplace, BBQ, hammocks, cornhole, & seating
- Two courtyards with BBQs, dining areas, firepits, & pools
